text: Minute Alapati Taupo OBE (1 February 1962 â€“ 23 May 2022) was a Tuvaluan politician, economist and accountant. Taupo was elected to the Parliament of Tuvalu in 2019. He was nominated as Deputy Prime Minister & Minister for Fisheries and Trade that same year. Before, he was the Ambassador to Taiwan from 2013 until 2017. Taupo died on 23 May 2022 from a heart attack while giving a speech in Nui, Tuvalu at the age of 60. ==Related pages== * List of scientists from Oceania ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Tuvaluan people Category:Economists Category:Ambassadors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Minute Alapati Taupo
